Package index

Data Import

Import GenX/PowerGenome MIP-case dataset and convert to US26MIP format

mip_import_raw_data()
Import GenX inputs and save in usensus/data-raw
mip_build_dataset()
Build MIP-USENSYS case dataset from GenX inputs
mip_import_capacity_factors()
Process capacity factors
mip_import_carbon_cap()
Process carbon CAP data
mip_import_energy_share_requirement()
Process energy share requirement data
mip_import_fuels()
Process fuels prices and emission factors data
mip_import_generators()
Import generators data to USENSYS data
mip_import_hourly_loads()
Process load data
mip_import_network()
Process network data
mip_import_offshore_wind_min_cap()
Process minimum capacity data for offshore wind
mip_import_representative_period()
Process representative period data
mip_import_yaml()
Create a YAML file for the MIP scenario based on GenX input files and a template
mip_make_fuel_groups()
Create fuel groups mapping table and save to the USENSYS data directory.
mip_make_resource_groups()
Create resource groups and save to the USENSYS data directory.
mip_make_zone_region()
Process region names and zone-region mapping.

Validation and summary

Check US26MIP data

mip_check_upper_bounds()
Check and correct declining upper bounds for capacity expansion.
mip_match_cf_process_lifetime()
Match capacity factors 'window' in data with process lifetime data.
mip_capacity_factors_mean()
Mean capacity factors for each Resource by year.
mip_capacity_factors_na()
Find number of NA values in the capacity factors data.
mip_capacity_factors_window()
Capacity factors data "window" in the data.
mip_resource_lifetime()
Calculate lifetime window for each Resource in the data.
mip_suggest_integer_columns()
A utility function to identify integer columns in a data frame

Building the model

Create a US26MIP model

mip_build_model()
Build the MIP-USENSYS model
mip_build_calendars()
Build calendars from MIP scenario data
mip_build_carbon_cap()
Build carbon cap policy from MIP scenario data
mip_build_conv_techs()
Build conventional technologies from MIP scenario data
mip_build_dataset()
Build MIP-USENSYS case dataset from GenX inputs
mip_build_demand()
Build demand from MIP scenario data
mip_build_energy_share_requirements()
Build energy share policy from MIP scenario data
mip_build_horizons()
Build horizons from MIP scenario data
mip_build_lostload_penalty()
Build lost load penalty policy from MIP scenario data
mip_build_min_capacity_requirements()
Title
mip_build_network()
Build electricity network from MIP scenario data
mip_build_storage()
Build storage technologies from MIP scenario data
mip_build_supply()
Build primary supply from MIP scenario data
mip_build_vre_techs()
Build VRE technologies from MIP scenario data
mip_build_weather()
Build weather factors from MIP scenario data

Run US26MIP model

Post-processing

Post-process US26MIP model results

mip_open_yaml()
Open a YAML file in the default text editor

Yaml file

mip_import_yaml()
Create a YAML file for the MIP scenario based on GenX input files and a template
mip_load_yaml() mip_read_yaml()
Load a YAML file for the MIP scenario
mip_open_yaml()
Open a YAML file in the default text editor
mip_write_yaml()
Create a YAML file for the MIP scenario
update_yaml()
Update multiple parameters in a YAML file
update_yaml_parameter()
Update a parameter in a YAML file

Utility functions

Utility functions for US26MIP

mip_load_scenario()
Load solved scenario
mip_load_yaml() mip_read_yaml()
Load a YAML file for the MIP scenario
mip_get_data()
Title
is_usensys_dir()
Check if a directory has 'usensys' data sub-directories
log_message() init_log_file() delete_log_file()
Log a message to a file
mip_resource_lifetime()
Calculate lifetime window for each Resource in the data.
mip_fuel_alias()
Map fuel names to aliases (internal function).
mip_resource_type()
Map technology names to technology types.
